#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;

int bin_search(int a[],int l,int r,int key)
{
int m;    
while(r-l>1)
{
m=(r+l)/2;
(a[m]>key?r:l)=m;
}

return r;
}

int longest_subsequence(int arr[],int n)
{
//int table[100001],i;
//memset(table,0,sizeof(table));
int table[n+1];
    
    int i;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    table[i]=0;
int len=1;

table[0]=arr[0];
for(i=1;i<n;i++)
{
if(arr[i]<table[0])
table[0]=arr[i];
else if(arr[i]>=table[len-1])
{
	table[len++]=arr[i];
}
else
{
	table[bin_search(table,0,len-1,arr[i])]=arr[i];
}
}

return len;
}
int main()
{
int n;
scanf("%d",&n);
int arr[n];
int i;
for(i=0;i<n;i++)
scanf("%d",&arr[i]);
printf("%d",longest_subsequence(arr,n));
return 0;
}
